name: my-full-stack-app
description: Full stack app with React Native frontend and Express.js backend

scripts.install:all: npm install && npm run install:frontend && npm run install:backend
scripts.test: concurrently "cd frontend && npm test" "cd backend && npm test"
scripts.lint: concurrently "cd frontend && npm run lint" "cd backend && npm run lint"
scripts.build: concurrently "cd frontend && npm run build" "cd backend && npm run build"
